sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Store} from '../Store' import { useContext } from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import CardHeader from 'react-bootstrap/esm/CardHeader'; import CardBody from 'react-bootstrap/esm/CardBody'; export default function OrderScreen() { const {state , dispatch} = useContext(Store) const {cart} = state const {order} = cart return ( <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping Name :  {order.shippingAdress.fullname} Adress :  {order.shippingAdress.adress} Not Delivered Payment Method :  {order.paymentMethod} Not Delivered ) }
